title: A Hall of Fame Keyboard Special - Now Offering Frank Bucks!
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: A Hall of Fame Keyboard Special - Now Offering Frank Bucks!
posts.post_content:
RAJAH BRESNAHAN OF FIGHTING CLAN

with Bresnahan family history referenced here

[url]http://cdnc.ucr.edu/cgi-bin/cdnc?a=d&d=SFC19130330.2.127.62[/url]

Rajah is now available for sale at the revised keyboard price of $77 with free shipping.

This is the batting pose obviously in VG condition (BVG 3).

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10055/bresnahan-batting-hof[/IMG]

with brown crap (See Post #6)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/junk/24026/no-brown-crap[/IMG]

without brown crap (See Post #6)

Any form of payment will do.  Add $3 for regular PayPal.  

My last listing in this section lasted 11 minutes, so don't let this one get away.;)

If, for some reason, your keyboard is shorter than mine, do not despair for common ground may exist.  Feel free to let me know via PM how long your keyboard is.

What are Frank Bucks? If you have purchased from me in the past on BST, you already have Frank Bucks. With every future purchase you will receive Frank Bucks at the rate of 2.5% (better than Ebay). They may be used to defray up to 10% of the cost of future purchases if you accept my asking price without haggling. If you want to know how many Frank Bucks you already have, just shoot me a PM. Frank Bucks expire when I do and have no cash value.

Gentleman, I have made a mistake.

I just counted the keys on my keyboard and there are only 77.

Therefore I feel obliged to reduce the price of the Keyboard Special to $77.

My apologies.
I counted mine 3 times & got 3 differnt totals so I'm disqualified.
Frank Bucks bump.  Look at initial listing for details.
I think they should be called Frucks!

I see the problem you are all having.  It's the brown crap on the edge of slab.  Well I can assure you that there is no brown crap on the edge of the slab.:D
It is a reflection from my brown wood paneled ceiling which occurs when I scan with the lid up at night when the ceiling lights are on.  I bet you are all relieved.

I will add another scan this morning without the brown crap this morning in the original post, but it will not be done with my CCD scanner so the card image with not be as good.  It's an imperfect world, but I don't sell brown crap.:eek:

Frank, you may think you're clever, but you're just a copycat.  :De

[url]http://www.fasinfrankvintage.com/services/frank-coins/[/url]
